amendment.description: To make technical corrections to provisions related to the National Museums of the Armed Forces.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4297 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4297 proposed by Senator Warner. (consideration: CR S5995-6004; text: CR S5996) To make technical corrections to provisions related to the National Museums of the Armed Forces.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4297 proposed by Senator Warner.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4297 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
